quote: As she looks through the window;
author: J.B.

quote: Let this little book be thy friend, if, owing to fortune or through thine own fault, thou canst not find a dearer companion.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: I could be the lone Eskimo, friend of whales and seals."
author: Jenn Fagan

quote: Even the most popular people could feel lonely sometimes.
author: Aishabella Sheikh

quote: It suddenly struck me that Dawsey is a lonesome person. I think it may be that he has always been lonely, but he didn't mind before, and now he minds.
author: Annie Barrows

quote: Tennis is the loneliest sport
author: Andre Agassi

quote: The sea was silent, the sky was silent; I was alone with the night and silence.
author: H.G. Wells

quote: Being alone is more painful than getting hurt.
author: Eiichiro Oda

quote: People will tell you not to give up, but they're always tired of you.
author: INB

quote: We are things of dry hours and the involuntary plan,
author: Gwendolyn Brooks

quote: Nothing was okay. And he was far from home.
author: Traci Chee

quote: No one could love a lonely girl, not unless she had the right kind of lonely
author: Nessie Q.

quote: Only a fraction of sane people enjoy their own company. The rest endure it.
author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quote: It struck her that he might have told no one, not even his brothers, how he felt, and she thought how lonely that might have been for him.
author: Colm Tóibín

quote: Who I really am, you don't want to see.
author: Elizabeth Carlton

quote: The biggest enemy of your loneliness is only your life partner.
author: Ehsan Sehgal

quote: As for me, I remained a few moments longer. I waved. No one waved back.
author: Markus Zusak

quote: Loneliness told me, I will not leave you alone.
author: Biju Karakkonam, Nature and Wildlife Photographer

quote: Love is not blind but if the heart has to choose between pain and loneliness, it will choose pain every time.
author: J. Autherine

quote: The most pleasant and pure feeling is to live with a sense of being part of the Motherland, because exactly this feeling spares [us] from loneliness.
author: Saparmurat Niyazov

quote: Like a wave we often float ashore to find something that feels like home.
author: Giovannie de Sadeleer

quote: He is lonely, even if he does not admit it. His way of life is nothing but an Outlet from Loneliness…

quote: Loneliness is your inability to see what it is, and this running away from yourself creates fear. Loneliness is nothing but fear of self.
author: Pragya Tiwari

quote: The only ones awake at three in the morning are either those who are lonely or those who are in love
author: Faraaz Kazi

quote: Eccentrics with unseeing eyes glided through, savouring amid so much society their own particular loneliness and private sins and sorrows.
author: Iris Murdoch

quote: Every boat needs a captain. Even when it's empty.
author: Giovannie de Sadeleer

quote: Spending time with God will fill vacant places in our lives.
author: Adria Wilkins

quote: I'm alone, but I'm not lonely. I like who I am. I like who I'm becoming.

quote: If you're so empty now, then why don't you start doing fun things? Fill yourself up with that? 'Cause the thing is, you ain't all alone, are you?

quote: Oh, how good it is to be with someone, sometimes.
author: Marguerite Duras

quote: Never allow yourself to make foolish decisions because of loneliness
author: Charmaine J Forde

quote: Search the whole world until you meet yourself.
author: Marjory Sheba

quote: I am not lonely, Mom," I snap. "I am alone. Those are different things.

quote: Both times it was loneliness, and the night, and panic afterwards.
author: E.M. Forster

quote: Mastery generally requires the ability to not only tolerate but also enjoy your own company.
author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quote: Like a boxer in a title fight, you have to walk in that ring alone.

quote: Love everyone until you start hating everyone
author: Neetesh Dixit

quote: Abortive time: unwilling to tarry
author: Munia Khan

quote: Lonely is a state of mind, not a place
author: R.J. Ellory

quote: They cannot scare me with their empty spaces
author: Robert Frost

quote: Love does the job. travelling too. writing does it. music.
author: Charlotte Eriksson

quote: It’s hard to make people care again once you’ve taught them not to. It’s hard to tell people that you need them, once you’ve told them you don’t.
author: Charlotte Eriksson

quote: For the briefest moment, Ulla despised Signy, as we can only hate those who rescue us from loneliness.
author: Leigh Bardugo

quote: The deeper the solitude the less the sense of loneliness, and the nearer our friends.

quote: I look for places like me: big, hollow, forgotten by almost everyone.
author: Jodi Picoult

quote: She thinks, briefly, that she has never felt so lonely in her life.
author: Jojo Moyes

quote: As a team you are all together, but you are alone in your thoughts. (Amarildo)

quote: All the lovely things I've known have disappeared.
author: Amiri Baraka

quote: [...] you soon become lonely if you want to use your own brain to find answers.

quote: Warm bodies littered across these streets
author: Akachi Obijiaku

quote: I haven’t seen my family in five years
author: Akachi Obijiaku

quote: I desperately want someone to see the anguish of my soul, for to walk alone in that kind of anguish creates an anguish all its own.

quote: Someone speak to me. Call out to me and take me out. Please, please, I'm begging you, say something kind to me.

author: Jean Thompson

quote: If anyone's ever told you there's peace in solitude, they haven't been alone for a very long time.
author: Dennis Wold-McGimsey

quote: How long can I be a wall, keeping the wind off?
author: Sylvia Plath

quote: being alone you decided, was a
author: Charles Bukowski

quote: I could no longer deny the truth. I was not invisible to him. I was
author: Marissa Meyer

quote: All the pain I put you through
author: Klaudio Marashi

quote: Is there anything so empty as something that's once been full?
author: Eliza Maxwell

quote: A conversation is so much more than words: a conversation is eyes, smiles, the silences between words.
author: Annika Thor

quote: Names always matter," Maz said..."And yours is such a lonely one, when you think about it."
author: Daniel José Older

quote: We isolated ourselves, because it hurt less.
author: Jodi Picoult

quote: She: I want to come into your life so that you would feel less lonely.
author: Avijeet Das

quote: One of the problems with people in Chicago, she remembered, was that they were never lonely at the same time.
author: Lorrie Moore

quote: This need for recognition and glory must have its roots in human loneliness.
author: Yiyun Li

quote: If I'm lonely
author: Adrienne Rich

quote: Writing is a solitary pleasure. Reading is a solitary pleasure. Does this mean that the writer and the readers do not like humanity?
author: Gabrielle Dubois

quote: Internet is a demon which eventually kills all the emotions inside human heart. Not to mention everything is already virtual.
author: Gurusharan Singh

quote: Kill the loneliness by being with yourself, all alone.

quote: This loneliness of mine is like a balm for the wounds
author: Avijeet Das

quote: I was not unhappy. I wanted to be with someone. But it didn't trouble me that I was alone.

quote: Loneliness is a bitter, wretched companion. Sometimes it just won't let go
author: Tahereh Mafi

quote: You have entered an abnormal, lonely, and unwelcome new world where you are nothing but an island of sadness.
author: Elisabeth Kübler-Ross

quote: People drown, quietly, before our eyes, all the time.
author: Ilsa J. Bick

quote: The mistake every lonely person makes is to confuse attention with love.

quote: If you find yourself in the middle of nowhere, allow your mind go everywhere.

quote: Dad called it "enlightenment" but to me, it just felt lonely.

quote: Give a lonely person a little attention and they'll mistake it for love.

quote: The money he stuffed into the gaping void of family fell limply through to the floor of a mansion he lived in alone.

quote: So I died many times that year.
author: Charlotte Eriksson

quote: The only thing that hate replaces, is loneliness.
author: Anthony T.Hincks

quote: If you're lonely, touch someone. Chances are, you'd end up travelling together.
author: Jenim Dibie

quote: the long walk home is
author: erik peake

quote: As a loner, I'm not always into talking to people, but music is hell everything I need.
author: Eyad Hussein

quote: ONE, may be a number.
author: Anthony T. Hincks

author: Katherine McIntyre

quote: The lonely suffer from this most: to mistake attention for love.
author: Marty Rubin

quote: They either come back or they don’t.
author: Ayushee Ghoshal

quote: I hate when I can't control my loneliness
author: -Leju Thomas

quote: Loneliness is a grief that I share with myself on the inside.
author: Anthony T. Hincks

quote: Ozi made me feel so known. He made love to my insides, filling desperate gaps and calming unbearably sensitive places.
author: Mohsin Hamid

quote: ....Dear friends, I am often a lonely man,
author: Sherman Alexie

quote: On Hemingway: Have you noticed how lonely all people in his works are - no relatives, no family?
author: Anna Akhmatova

quote: Here is the burden of my argument with life. I have forgotten homesickness.
author: Aritha Van Herk

quote: No, No one likes being alone. But I've learned how to live with it.
author: André Aciman

quote: Yes, she was lonely, but she missed no one in particular. Whom could she miss? Her days were full of life and pleasure, but they passed so quickly.

quote: The familiar shape of the cross still gleamed above the distant forest, but now that I had found companions it no longer made any impression on me.
author: Shōhei Ōoka

quote: share with me"
author: Halina Poświatowska

quote: Biker George says you're not alone anywhere when you know The One who's with you everywhere.
author: Dano Janowski

quote: The person that fights for every minute of his time will have to be lonely most times
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: One of the greatest things that can happen to you is loneliness
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: You are a pastel-colored Persian carpet, and loneliness is a Bordeaux wine stain that won’t come out
author: Haruki Murakami

quote: The silence in the house was painful, but I had begun to realize that half of it belonged to me.

quote: Find company within yourself and you'll never spend a day alone. Find love within yourself and you'll never have a lonely day.

quote: I want you to look at me the way I look at the ceiling in the night. The way three am knows my name.

quote: They say never ride with the ones you didn’t walk with, real friends show you real love not only talk it.
author: John Maiorana (oohGiovanni)

quote: Sometimes I think that my own company is more suitable for me than if I were around others. Because of the person that I am.
author: Kyle Labe

author: Jon Krakauer

quote: I guess...I just want someone to love me and take me for who I am.
author: Kyle Labe

quote: Everyone was just a lonely mouth, a mouth with teeth, a mouth with ventricles, a muddy hole of a mouth in the crook of someone's elbow.

quote: The heart of a man is like deep water.
author: Douglas Coupland

quote: No sea of solitude is so deep that it can drown us.
author: Balroop Singh

quote: There are worse things than
author: J. Andrew Schrecker

quote: Wife and loneliness are the best friends of a man. If wife leaves you, loneliness follows you wherever you are!
author: Fahad Basheer

quote: music heals the loneliness
author: Nader Ebrahimi (Nadir İbrahimi)

quote: The trap is loneliness, and none of us escapes it. Not even me.
author: Leigh Bardugo

quote: None of us are really alone as long as we're lonely.
author: Maggie Stiefvater

quote: I want to belong. Belonging makes things okay, and I want to be okay. I just want to be okay.

quote: Because in our pain we must find each other – mirror to mirror the grace of our shared humanity, the stunningly broken beauty of our shared grief.

quote: Only the thirsty knows the real taste of water; only the lonely knows the real weight of emptiness!

quote: My homesickness is a tangible thing, like a cannon ball of sadness, just pushing into my heart.

quote: Unclaimed or abandoned bodies. There could be no stronger definition of loneliness.

quote: When the crowd follows you, their noise can misguide you. When you follow the crowd, their direction may mislead you.

quote: A ghost has all the time to reach for love, but never can. As a person has little time to reach for love, and never does.

quote: Only the dying know what real loneliness is.

quote: I'm in hell. I'm separate from everyone and everything. I'm John Travolta in The Boy in the Plastic Bubble.

quote: My hearts been fleeting up so high,I'm longing for the leaps of the day & heaps of the night to pace my soul with a subtle sublimity of myth.

quote: Homer looked back at me. 'Pete, can I tell ya somethin' real important?'

quote: Your loneliness can end at any moment because the world is full lonely souls!

quote: One caress and he left me feeling empty, one more time.

quote: To-night I close my eyes and see
author: Sara Teasdale

quote: There’s nothing abnormal about loneliness.
author: Paula Stokes

quote: He would be lonely all his life. But a man took it for his share and went on.
author: Marjorie Kinnan Rawlings

quote: i am in need of a sudden Shift,
author: Syed Murtaza Haroon

quote: You know something, you never know what lonely is until you are really alone, alone all day, alone all night, with no one to talk to.

quote: And then after that long, long phone call, she wept.
author: Makoto Shinkai

quote: When I am all alone, I often, very often, say your name aloud…
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: The hush of the night sky is the silence of a graveyard.

quote: When she came home, she smelled the way I like. But . . . her face seemed sadder than when she left.
author: Makoto Shinkai

quote: The only one waiting at home for me is my cat!
author: Makoto Shinkai

quote: ...and since, human speech is like a cracked tin kettle, on which we hammer out tunes to make bears dance when we long to move the stars
author: Flaubert Gustave

quote: Nothing is worse than loneliness.
author: Wayne    Smith

quote: What's the point of wandering?
author: Asper Blurry

quote: So now it’s this thing I do.
author: Charlotte Eriksson

quote: She didn’t care if the world thought she was pretty. All she wanted was that special someone to reach beyond the surface and discover her heart.

quote: Seasons happened and things got colder and harder and suddenly I found myself smoking circles in the air

quote: He celebrated his solitude with a frown.

quote: Books have given me a magic portal to connect with people of the past and the present. I know I shall never feel lonely or powerless again.

quote: No matter whom I'm with I'll always be alone," she said. And she added with a roguish touch: "Excellency.

author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: Loneliness is like a big, empty room inside you that echoes with the sounds of the life you're not living.

quote: Then I drop to my knees because I can't find a decent enough reason not to, because reluctance rarely stands a chance against repeated behavior.

quote: . . . Like ashes of gold in a cinnamon-flame,
author: Haoran Meng

quote: night has enveloped, to give me some relief
author: Mirza Sharafat Hussain Beigh

quote: If you think it ain’t dismal and lonesome out in a fog that way, by yourself, in the night, you try it once – you’ll see.
author: Mark Twain

quote: My desperation is deliberate. Despondency's a pheromone.
author: Kris Kidd

quote: My earnest desire for you has brought me to a point, where the life I've imagined we shall have, seems like a distant memory.
author: A.D. Orbit

quote: If I can teach myself the art of loneliness, then perhaps the art of writing will come more easily to me.
author: Nell Stevens

quote: My recurring desire for you has brought me to a point, where, the life I always imagine I shall have with you, seems like a distant memory.
author: A.R.

quote: Was this really friendship? I have my doubts.
author: Wataru Watari

quote: Love will not come to me again. I’ll vegetate like a plant in a cellar, without light.
author: Eliza Granville

quote: The extravagant cost of staying is watching others leave.-Commitment Defined
author: L.v. Jones

quote: I always come here when I can't sleep [. . .] every night.
author: Faith Erin Hicks

quote: My recurring desire for you has brought me to a point, where, the life I always imagine I shall have with you, seems like a distant memory.
author: A.D. Orbit

quote: He really is alone in whatever hell this is.
author: Patrick Ness

quote: We hide our demons so good, that the angels we show, bare the shame on their faces.
author: Anthony Liccione

quote: How did men make themselves loved, I wondered. I had passed all my life with men who were loved but I seemed never to have learnt the lesson.
author: Maria McCann

quote: You will always remain lonely till the day you meet a person who can understand your mind deeply!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Together we were something less, which felt like such a relief, to not be ourselves for a while.

quote: The dog upstairs won't shut up, but I can't hate him, he's up there alone all day, making noise must be the only way he knows he's not a ghost.
author: Danez Smith

quote: He knows her like man knows earth, touching the surface but unaware of her depth.
author: Piper Payne

quote: For how long would I be trapped in the condition of melancholy without going insane?
author: Neda Aria

quote: Connor was....getting farther and farther ahead of me. I was frozen. And sometimes I feel like I haven't quite thawed.
author: Debra Dockter

quote: [...] because she wanted to be alone while surrounded by people.
author: Yaa Gyasi

quote: It is good to be alone, for solitude is difficult; that something is difficult should be one more reason to do it.
author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quote: Even in an empty room, we are never alone.
author: Wayne Gerard Trotman

quote: Fighting the good fight is not as easy when you’re fighting alone.
author: Joan Ambu

quote: No one is ever alone and silence does not equate defeat.
author: Joan Ambu

quote: If I exist, then surely there must be someone else out there like me.
author: Joyce Rachelle

quote: I feel like I could disappear because I'm not real to other people.
author: Miranda Emmerson

quote: Despair was a private weakness she could not afford to indulge.
author: Robin McKinley

quote: I think there is a difference between aloneness and loneliness. Aloneness is necessary for the soul to thrive - even to come alive. Not loneliness.
author: Steve Goodier

quote: I felt lonely, and in full possession of my loneliness. It was the first time I had owned anything of value.
author: Ben Greenman

quote: Can I Tinder swipe for cat cuddles?
author: Shannon M Mullen

quote: What's going to happen to us?
author: Tsukumizu

quote: The Sun is never alone as the light remains with him always. Even when he goes down sinking...sinking, the light drowns with him
author: Munia Khan

quote: A box sits empty,
author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quote: When one is just sad one should just be alone.
author: Will Advise

quote: How do you explain to a child who likes everyone in the world that adult life consists to a great extent of cutting people away?
author: Miranda Emmerson

quote: He stroked her back and kept a fierce grip on her like she’d fade away into one of the thousands of ghosts in this cemetery.
author: Katherine McIntyre

quote: I’m . . . accustomed to being alone. There are times when alone is the best place to be. I enjoy my own company.
author: Sara Naveed

quote: You better go alone, than with negative people!
author: Israelmore Ayivor

quote: Being bored is the price we pay for not being insane.
author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quote: If you want to miss your crown, follow the crowd. If you want to wear the crown, go alone and be yourself.
author: Israelmore Ayivor

quote: My past lives alone. That's why my loneliness wants to live in the past
author: Munia Khan

quote: Loneliness is the manifestation of the conflict between our desire for meaning and the absence of objective meaning from the universe.
author: Neel Burton

quote: She sits there and feels the loneliness and the lack of him
author: Maggie O'Farrell

quote: I may be too young to be lonely, but I am too lonely to be young.
author: Caroline Yawn

quote: Solitude, the joy of being alone, stems from, as well as promotes, a state of maturity and inner richness.
author: Neel Burton

quote: Sitting in a corner, I live like a toad
author: Munia Khan

quote: There is no place more lonely
author: Margarita Engle

quote: An overcrowded world is the ideal place in which to be lonely.
author: Brian W. Aldiss

quote: Each day was very much like any other day, because they were alone so much that nothing ever disturbed them.
author: Carson McCullers

quote: I am so lost in the lost road ,
author: BinYamin Gulzar

quote: The corner doesn't mind listening to the stupid things I say;
author: Margo T. Rose

quote: No better school invented yet than the school of loneliness in the matters of understanding our deep-self!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Eventually everyone will give up on you
author: Ali hassan hasan

quote: I don't have friends. Before I can't without friends.
author: Mario Fingarov

quote: When had I stopped being a person with Paranoid Schizophrenia, and become a Paranoid Schizophrenic; defined by my illness?
author: Michaela Haze

quote: Give me wildflowers instead of your heart, for I’d rather have them wither than the latter.
author: dandelionlady96

quote: Embracing human frailty, fallibility, and heartbreaking aloneness is crucial for any person seeking to attain self-actualization and self-realization.
author: Kilroy J. Oldster

quote: We do not recognize that we are addicted to some negative psychological habit, some terribly self-destructive patterns of thinking...
author: Abhishek S

quote: Desires and Karma are the worst enemies living in the same soul together. It depends on us whom we choose and feed.
author: Abhishek S

quote: LIFE - Death's Very Emissary
author: Abhishek S

quote: Even so have I given the womb of the earth to those that be sown in it in their times.
author: Compton Gage

quote: Loneliness is a strange sort of thing.
author: tahereh mafi

quote: Yes you have returned
author: Joyce Rachelle

quote: The walls of hell are coated with arrogance, and the floor is covered with pride.
author: T.A. Cline

quote: Like as a young child may not bring forth the things that belong to the aged, even so have I disposed the world which I created.
author: Compton Gage

quote: Poem to Be Read at 3:00 A.M.
author: Donald Justice

quote: They that be born in the strength of youth are of one fashion, and they that are born in the time of age, when the womb fail, are otherwise.
author: Compton Gage

quote: Loneliness was a full-body sensation, an anti-exhilaration, from his core outward.
author: Charlie Jane Anders

quote: Bad habits are demons that often push us into isolation because they know that in our loneliness they stand little chance of being overcome.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quote: Loneliness teaches and shows you the real and unreal and such things that one can never understand and even imagine living with others.
author: Ehsan Sehgal

quote: Stand up upon the right side, and I shall expound the similitude unto thee.
author: Compton Gage

quote: As for the tokens whereof thou ask me, I may tell thee of them in part: but as touching thy life, I am not sent to shew thee.
author: Compton Gage

quote: Iniquity shall be increased above that which now thou see, or that thou hast heard long ago.
author: Compton Gage

quote: The land, that thou see now to have root, shall thou see wasted suddenly.
author: Compton Gage

quote: Blood shall drop out of wood, and the stone shall give his voice, and the people shall be troubled:
author: Compton Gage

quote: He shall rule, whom they look not for that dwell upon the earth, and the fowls shall take their flight away together:
author: Compton Gage

quote: The Sodomy sea shall cast out fish, and make a noise in the night, which many have not known: but they shall all hear the voice thereof.
author: Compton Gage

quote: One land also shall ask another, and say, ‘Is righteousness that makes a man righteous gone through thee?’ And it shall say, ‘No.
author: Compton Gage

quote: At the same time shall men hope, but nothing obtain: they shall labor, but their ways shall not prosper.
author: Compton Gage

quote: To shew thee such tokens I have leave; and if thou wilt pray again, and weep as now, and fast even days, thou shall hear yet greater things.
author: Compton Gage

quote: An extreme fearfulness moves through all your body, and your mind is troubled more.
author: Compton Gage

quote: Hear me, and I will instruct thee; hearken to the thing that I say, and I shall tell thee more.
author: Compton Gage

quote: Thou art sore troubled in mind for the people in the world’s sake: loves thou that people better than he that made them?
author: Compton Gage

quote: O Lord that bear rule, who may know these things, but he that had not his dwelling with men?
author: Compton Gage

quote: As for you, you're unwise: how may you then speak of these things whereof thou ask you?
author: Compton Gage

quote: I will liken my judgment unto a ring: like as there is no slackness of the last, even so there is no swiftness of the first.
author: Compton Gage

quote: Could thou not make those that have been made, and be now, and that are for to come, at once; that thou might shew thy judgement the sooner?
author: Compton Gage

quote: The creature may not haste above the maker; neither may the world hold them at once that shall be created therein.
author: Compton Gage

quote: After seven days of fasten so it was, that the thoughts of my heart were very grievous unto me- and my soul recovered the spirit of understanding.
author: Compton Gage

quote: What betrayed me? Was it my heart? Or my Soul?
author: Compton Gage

quote: The more thou search, the more thou shall marvel.
author: Compton Gage

quote: Go thy way, weigh me the weight of the fire, or measure me the blast of the wind, or call me again the day that is past.
author: Compton Gage

quote: It were better that we were not at all, than that we should live still in wickedness, and to suffer, and not to know wherefore.
author: Compton Gage

quote: Verily it is a foolish thought that they both have devised, for the ground is given unto the wood, and the sea also had its place to bear its floods.
author: Compton Gage

quote: Thou hast given a right judgment, but why judge thou not thyself also?
author: Compton Gage

quote: I beseech thee, O Lord, let me have understanding: For it was not my mind to be curious of the high things, but of such as pass by us daily.
author: Compton Gage

quote: Why the law of our forefathers are brought to nought, and the written covenants come to none effect-
author: Compton Gage

quote: We pass away out of the world as grasshoppers, and our life is astonishment and fear, and we are not worthy to obtain mercy.
author: Compton Gage

quote: What will he then do unto his name whereby we are called? ...of these things have I asked.
author: Compton Gage

quote: What man is able to do that, that thou should ask such things of me?
author: Compton Gage

quote: The more thou search, the more thou shall marvel; for the world hast fast to pass away-
author: Compton Gage

quote: As concerning the things whereof thou asked me, I will tell thee; for the evil is sown, but the destruction thereof is not yet come.
author: Compton Gage

quote: How, and when shall these things come to pass? wherefore are our years few and evil?
author: Compton Gage

quote: Do not thou hasten above the most Highest: for thy haste is in vain to be above him, for thou hast much exceeded.
author: Compton Gage

quote: Go thy way to a woman with child, and ask of her when she had fulfilled her nine months, if her womb may keep the birth any longer within her.
author: Compton Gage

quote: From the beginning, look, what thou desires to see, it shall be shew thee.
author: Compton Gage

quote: No one has ever properly understood me, I have never fully understood anyone; and no one understands anyone else
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: A lonely soul is the best friend of itself

quote: Happiness changes the way you see the world.

quote: Thy heart had gone too far in this world, and think thou to comprehend the way of the most High?

quote: Weigh thou therefore their wickedness now in the balance, and theirs also that dwell the world; and so shall thy name no where be found anymore.
author: Compton Gage

quote: Go thy way, and tell my people, the people of thy Lord God what manner of things, and how great wonders of the Lord thy God, thou hast seen.
author: Compton Gage

quote: Love wins when reflections win over reflexes.

quote: An echo from the past when, innocent

quote: The Solitary

quote: I am scared of this emptiness, pull me out of my body

quote: The lonely? Where's that from?

quote: there is a difference between
author: AVA.

quote: and sadness clung to me

quote: I gave them everything I had, and I guess it feels
author: Kris Kidd

quote: we used to talk all night

author: Abhishek Shukla

quote: If you sent speaking pages, they would be like a brother to me.

quote: the pavement makes no sound

quote: When you are alone you can easily judge yourself.

quote: ...I did what most kids do when their world feels destroyed. I tried to care less about what remained...It was untrue, of course.
author: Adam Haslett

quote: Being loved is the only thing that is admirable by any stretch of the imagination.

quote: I sit on a rock and watch children playing

quote: Tenderhearted people are silent sufferers they just learn the art to fly with broken wings.

quote: Its not your fault for not being there.

quote: There's a story behind every
author: Abhishek Shukla

quote: I wish I could see a cherry blossom or a lotus flower. Where could they be?

quote: [He] used to be so

quote: Life in this village is like that of a louse hanging on to a wrinkle in a loincloth.

quote: alone, drinking coffee, listening to the playlist that include the songs that remember you with the best and bad moments of your life.

quote: The main thing about aliens is that they are alien. They feel no responsibility for fulfilling any of your expectations. (Dark City Lights)

quote: I can't recall the sound of your voice

quote: And I'm okay with drowning.

quote: … and now and then we could look up and give each other a thought,

quote: Again, I've missed you by a minute

quote: loneliness gives you opportunity to look the beauty of out of window

quote: There's nothing like standing kissing-close to a beautiful stranger to make you really feel your loneliness.

quote: Love and loneliness, they are both coincidences.

quote: Prepare for a radio, for nothing is silent like the grave

quote: Don't forget - you're the one who swam across the freezing sea at night.

quote: I was much younger, much hungrier, much more alone. But I was myself, pared down to the essentials.

quote: I can have patience for anything, but it's waiting for love, that kills me a little each day.

quote: I believe that individuals nowadays are probably more aware of their inner loneliness than has ever been true before in history.

quote: No life is a waste. The only time we waste is the time we spend thinking we are alone.

quote: Everyone’s searching for someone to end the pain of loneliness. Even the darkest of souls wants a shot at redemption.

quote: Fear is the most prodigious enemy of our soul

quote: Isolated people, those who live alone, are always conscious of their condition in the homes of families.

quote: Solitude that throws the honest rays of perfect euphoria;
author: Debatrayee Banerjee

quote: Days feels like years when you're alone.
author: Auliq Ice

quote: Sad truth is. . . we all end up alone on some death bed. Yeah? No way to take anybody else's place and no way we can be lying on the same one.

quote: It's bad to be unable to stand solitude.
author: Tolstoy, Leo

quote: So now the sky was falling.
author: Mary Connealy

quote: Prayer and Meditation
author: Swami Dhyan Giten

quote: You are the least-alone person I have ever known. Your heart has always included within it everyone who let you love them, and many who did not.

quote: Respect is reverence out of love, Fear is reverence out of hate.Choose Wisely
author: Abhishek Shukla

quote: As a remedy to life in society I would suggest the big city. Nowadays, it is the only desert within our means.
author: Albert Camus

quote: Loneliness is a shadow of death
author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

quote: I can’t sleep alone anymore

quote: Sometimes in utter hopelessness I put my cheek on the table like it was someone. I wanted to wake my brain up and be loved.

quote: In the end it will be your “Actions” “Convictions” & “Thoughts” which will determine how you shaped your life.
author: Abhishek Shukla

quote: Here is the voice of my main Character in my Talon book series, I’ll let her introduce herself to you:

quote: When you are stressed and challenged by hardships just smile through it as frowning won’t help in changing the situation
author: Abhishek Shukla

quote: Its all about perception in life, For some One minus One = One & for some its Zero.That's the only difference.
author: Abhishek Shukla

quote: You read something which you thought only happened to you, and you discovered it happened 100 years ago to Dostoyevsky.
author: James Baldwin
